page.title: 05Farming continued
page.content: farmers have a fold yard and at one farm we were allowed to go into the fold yard with the cattle.Two of the farmers have a cattle shed.Some of the farmers have old brick buildings that they use for storage.One farmer has a pig unit used for rearing pigs. Eight farmers have a combine harvester most of these have a large farm.As we visited the farms we saw tractors, ploughs,seed drills,potato harvesters, harrows,trailers,balers,sugar beet harvesters,fork lifts,a side hoe, rollers,sprayers and muck spreaders. Nearly all the farms are family farms. One farm has a manager.Six farms have belonged to the same family for a 100 years or more,six for 30 years or more and two for 20 years or less.The old farm houses are brick built and very attractive.
